title: 100 Meter
description: A full 100 meter sprint on the straightaway of the track.

title: 200 Meter
description: A 200 meter sprint starting on the curve of the track, focusing on top-end speed.

title: 400 Meter
description: A sprint around the entire track, showing strength, speed, and endurance

title: 110 Meter Hurdles
description: A sprint through the straightaway, having athletes jump over hurdles as quick as possible.

title: Long Jump
description: A shortened run up until a white board where the athlete must jump as far as they can.

title: Javelin
description: Throw a thin javelin soaring through the air as far as possible.
